languages.text: "Ха! Вы зовете его врагом, но для него вы — лишь паразиты. Он не воюет против вас, а занимается истреблением паразитов. Вы его раздражаете — и это прекрасно. Поймите, чем вы досаждаете ему, и поймете, как вывести его из себя. Останется лишь расставить ловушку".

"Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."
languages.original_text: "Ха! Вы зовете его врагом, но для него вы — лишь паразиты. Он не воюет против вас, а занимается истреблением паразитов. Вы его раздражаете — и это прекрасно. Поймите, чем вы досаждаете ему, и поймете, как вывести его из себя. Останется лишь расставить ловушку".

traits.locale_text: "If I understand correctly... No. I am completely certain that your world has suffered a disaster never before seen by the Expanse. The creature that rages on Vheabos is a member of the ancient xenos race, named Necrons. Even I know very little about them to be able to predict the consequences of this calamity. So do not try to do everything alone — the protection the Imperium from the threat is the Inquisition's concern."

"If I understand correctly... No. I am completely certain that your world has suffered a disaster never before seen by the Expanse. So do not try to do everything alone — the protection the Imperium from the threat is the Inquisition's concern."

"Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."

languages.text: “哈！你称它为敌人，但在它眼里，你不过是只害虫。这根本不是什么战争，仅仅是灭绝而已。你是个麻烦精，而这就是你的优点。只要能弄明白你做了什么事情让它这么烦恼，你就知道该怎么把它逼疯。接下来的事情，只要设置陷阱，等它上钩就好了。”
languages.original_text: "Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."

traits.locale_text: “哈！你称它为敌人，但在它眼里，你不过是只害虫。这根本不是什么战争，仅仅是灭绝而已。你是个麻烦精，而这就是你的优点。只要能弄明白你做了什么事情让它这么烦恼，你就知道该怎么把它逼疯。接下来的事情，只要设置陷阱，等它上钩就好了。”

languages.text: «¡Ja! Lo llamáis vuestro enemigo, pero sois meras plagas a sus ojos. Esto no es una guerra, es un exterminio. Sois una molestia, y esa es vuestra ventaja. Entiende qué es lo que haces que tanto le molesta, y entenderás cómo volverlo loco. Todo lo que hará falta será tender una trampa».
languages.original_text: "Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja! Lo llamáis vuestro enemigo, pero sois meras plagas a sus ojos. Esto no es una guerra, es un exterminio. Sois una molestia, y esa es vuestra ventaja. Entiende qué es lo que haces que tanto le molesta, y entenderás cómo volverlo loco. Todo lo que hará falta será tender una trampa».

languages.text: 「はは！アンタはやつを敵と呼ぶが、やつから見ればアンタは虫けらにすぎない。これは戦争ではなく、駆除だ。アンタは厄介者だが、それが強味でもある。やつをめちゃくちゃいらだたせるには、何をしたらいいかをアンタが分かっていればいいのだ。そうすりゃ、どうすれば相手を狂わせることができるかがわかるだろう。そうなれば、後は罠を仕掛けるだけさ」
languages.original_text: "Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."

traits.locale_text: 「はは！アンタはやつを敵と呼ぶが、やつから見ればアンタは虫けらにすぎない。これは戦争ではなく、駆除だ。アンタは厄介者だが、それが強味でもある。やつをめちゃくちゃいらだたせるには、何をしたらいいかをアンタが分かっていればいいのだ。そうすりゃ、どうすれば相手を狂わせることができるかがわかるだろう。そうなれば、後は罠を仕掛けるだけさ」

languages.text: « Ha ! Vous appelez cette créature votre ennemi alors que vous n'êtes que de la vermine à ses yeux. Ça n'a rien d'une guerre, c'est de l'extermination pure et simple... Pour elle, vous n'êtes qu'une nuisance et c'est ce que vous devez tourner à votre avantage. Essayez de comprendre ce qui l'irrite chez vous et vous saurez comment la rendre dingue... Il ne vous restera alors plus qu'à lui tendre un piège. »
languages.original_text: "Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Vous appelez cette créature votre ennemi alors que vous n'êtes que de la vermine à ses yeux. Ça n'a rien d'une guerre, c'est de l'extermination pure et simple... Pour elle, vous n'êtes qu'une nuisance et c'est ce que vous devez tourner à votre avantage. Essayez de comprendre ce qui l'irrite chez vous et vous saurez comment la rendre dingue... Il ne vous restera alors plus qu'à lui tendre un piège. »

languages.text: "Ha! Ihr nennt es Euren Feind, doch in seinen Augen seid Ihr bloß Ungeziefer. Das ist kein Krieg, das ist eine Auslöschung. Ihr seid ein Ärgernis, und das ist Euer Vorteil. Wenn Ihr versteht, was genau an Eurem Verhalten das Monster so quält, dann versteht Ihr auch, wie Ihr es in den Wahnsinn treiben könnt. Dann müsst Ihr es nur noch in eine Falle locken."
languages.original_text: "Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."

languages.text: "Hah, düşmanmış! Onun gözünde haşerattan ibaretsiniz. Savaş değil bu, kırım. Ona ancak rahatsızlık verebiliyorsunuz, bu da elinizde bir koz. Ne yapıp da yaratığa böyle dert olduğunuzu öğrenmelisiniz. Böylece onu çıldırtabilirsiniz. Geriye de sadece tuzak kurmak kalıyor."
languages.original_text: "Ha! You call it your enemy, but you are mere pests in its eyes. This isn't war, this is extermination. You are a nuisance, and that is your asset. Understand what it is you do that vexes it so much, and you will understand how to drive it mad. All that will be left then is to lay a trap."
